data.persona: I am a farmer. I grow crops on my land. I like to work with my hands. I get up early, and go to bed very late.
data.description:
You are in the Barn.
A large shed like building aside any farmers house. Usually made out of wood with a large gate for moving animals. Used to store animals or farm equipment.
There's a wood, a barn, a bucket, a large gate, and a shed here.
The horse and the milk maid are here.

You are carrying a tool.

data.short_motivation: I want to keep the tool in the barn
data.mid_motivation: I want to have a long peaceful night rest
data.long_motivation: I hope to get a great harvest in a few months
